data.name: Badul, the One-Eyed
data.notes: "Badul, the One-Eyed" is a hoodless daytime assassin that will drop out of no where to surprise visitors on the rooftop of a building in the south west corner of hilal stronghold, the Ganglion base to the south of Hilal Meadow in sourthern Sylvalum. The door to the roof is locked but a nearby raised path makes it easy to simply jump onto the roof on foot.
